name: Lemon Poke Cake II
author: MARBALET
summary: This is a moist lemony cake. It is called a poke cake because you poke holes in it to absorb the glaze.  If you want, you can serve this with vanilla ice cream or whipped topping.
ingredients: 1 (3.4 ounce) package instant lemon pudding mix
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Grease and flour a 9x13 inch pan
In a large bowl, stir together the cake mix and instant pudding
Add the water, oil and eggs, mix until smooth and well blended
Spread batter evenly into the prepared pan
Bake for 40 to45 minutes in the preheated oven, until a toothpick inserted comes out clean
While the cake is still hot, poke holes in the top with a fork
In a small bowl, mix together the lemon juice and confectioners sugar until smooth
